1.2. What's new since the last release

In this version of LFS, there has been a major reorganization of the book using techniques that avoid changing the host system and provides a more straight forward build process.

Below is a list of package updates made since the previous release of the book.

Upgraded to:

  • Acl-2.3.1

  • Attr-2.5.1

  • Automake-1.16.4

  • Bash 5.1.8

  • Bc 5.0.0

  • Binutils-2.37

  • Bison-3.7.6

  • DejaGNU-1.6.3

  • Diffutils-3.8

  • E2fsprogs-1.46.4

  • Expat-2.4.1

  • File-5.40

  • GCC-11.2.0

  • GDBM-1.20

  • Glibc-2.34

  • Grep-3.7

  • GRUB-2.06

  • IANA-Etc-20210611

  • IPRoute2-5.13.0

  • Kmod-29

  • Less-590

  • Libcap-2.53

  • Libelf-0.185 (from elfutils)

  • Libffi-3.4.2

  • Linux-5.13.12

  • M4-1.4.19

  • Man-pages-5.13

  • Meson-0.59.1

  • Openssl-1.1.1l

  • Perl-5.34.0

  • Python-3.9.6

  • Shadow-4.9

  • Sysklogd-1.5.1

  • SysVinit-2.99

  • Texinfo-6.8

  • Util-Linux-2.37.2

  • Vim-8.2.3337

  • Zstd-1.5.0

Added:

  • binutils-2.37-upstream_fix-1.patch

  • gcc-11.1.0-upstream_fixes-1.patch

Removed:
